data.name: SHOOTER LEAGUE - BATTLEPASS ZERO
data.detailed_description:
The Battlepass Zero contains

--Spector One Blue
--Spector One All Start
--Sporti Alpha Black XS
data.about_the_game:
The Battlepass Zero contains

--Spector One Blue
--Spector One All Start
--Sporti Alpha Black XS
data.short_description: This battlepass will activate the battlepass zero, with this activation you will be able to unlock the items in the battlepass
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 750 ti or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970 or better
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
